text: Ani adacya bhavace smarana kara, jevha tyane apalya janasamuhacya lokanna ahakaphamadhye (valucya tekadivara) khabaradara kele, ani nihsansaya, tyacya purvihi bhaya dakhavinare ho'una geleta ani tyacya nantarahi ki tumhi allahakherija dusaryanci upasana karu naka. Nihsansaya, mala tumacyabaddala mothya divasacya azabace bhaya vatate
